title: Pixel 2 not started: ERROR: Slot Unbootable: Load Error
content:
Hello,
my problem started with "Canâ€™t load Android System". I tried this: https://drive.google.com/file/d/18ZWAxd3qa1p61ZtFhbz-fGr66FJCqviM/view
but when I try to start "Recovery mode" the Pixel rebooted. So I run Factory data reset and after reboot there is Fastboot mode with green Android on back and green "Start", but with error "ERROR: Slot Unbootable: Load Error". When I try "Recovery mode" there is black screen for a second and I am back in Fastboot mode. Sometimes there is: "ERROR: BootLinux Failed: Not started"

When the Pixel is connected to USB and I run "fastboot devices" I can see "HT82.... fastboot"

Thank you for your reply.

Michal
